data.title: (Charles & Rupert) Johnson family
data.meta_description: #41 (Charles & Rupert) Johnson family on the 2024 America's Richest Families - The Johnson family built and owns about 40% of NYSE-listed mutual fund giant
data.text:
Jeon Somi Discusses Path To ‘Ice Cream’ & Artistic Confidence: ‘Now I Know What I Want’

Jeon Somi opens up about her path to new pop single "Ice Cream" and artistic confidence.

India Box Office: ‘Ulajh’, ‘Auron Mein Kaha Dum Tha’ Score Low

Bollywood box office: A detailed report on how the Hindi films 'Ulajh' and 'Auron Mein Kahan Dum Tha' fared at the box office in their first week at the ticket windows.

Latto Releases Collab-Packed Album ‘Sugar Honey Iced Tea’

Latto's third studio album 'Sugar Honey Iced Tea' is here and sees the rapper exploring a variety of different sounds.

Some Notes And Nuggets Involving Major League Baseball And Bristol

Next year's Major League baseball game between the Atlanta Braves and Cincinnati Reds may be the first MLB game in Tennessee, but baseball has deep roots in this area.

NASCAR Racers And Former MLB Greats React To Reds-Braves At Bristol

NASCAR drivers and former Major League Baseball stars think the Atlanta Braves-Cincinnati Reds game at Bristol Motor Speedway in 2025 will be a Grand Slam for both.

Daniel Cormier Calls Out UFC For Protecting Its ‘Golden Goose’

Why isn’t Alex Pereira defending his UFC light heavyweight title against Magomed Ankalaev? That’s a question I asked and apparently, Daniel Cormier did as well.

What England Can Expect From Interim Head Coach Lee Carsley

England's interim head coach Lee Carsley has worked with half of the Euro 2024 squad in his previous roles. He also knows the players who didn't go to Germany.

WWE SmackDown Results: Winners And Grades As Roman Reigns Returns

WWE SmackDown results on August 9, 2024 with fallout from WWE SummerSlam 2024 as Roman Reigns returns to confront Solo Sikoa.

Today’s ‘Wordle’ #1148 Hints, Clues And Answer For Saturday, August 10th

Looking for help with today's New York Times Wordle? Here are hints, clues and commentary to help you solve today's Wordle and sharpen your guessing game.

‘Astro Bot’ Ups The Challenge But Stays Approachable For Families

Father-daughter hands-on with the game to see how well it works for families. Interview with studio head, Nicolas Doucet, highlights some novel accessibility features.

Succession: The Brewing Controversy Over The Murdoch Family Trust

The Murdoch case highlights the challenges of balancing business continuity, family harmony, and individual aspirations in high-stakes succession planning.

Ex-Dividend Reminder: Charles Schwab, Premier Financial And IBM

On 8/9/24, Charles Schwab, Premier Financial, and International Business Machines will all trade ex-dividend for their respective upcoming dividends.

Supposed Charles Schwab Bank Fraud Dept Text Message Scam

We recently had a client fall prey to a sophisticated Schwab Bank scam.

A Family Affair: Javier Milei Relies On The Caputo Family For Strategy And Policy

At some point, Milei and Caputo will have to lift currency restrictions. They desperately need investment and some sort of jumpstarting of consumption and output. It's not clear whether they agree, though.
